title: Adult aberrant astrocytes submitted to late passage cultivation lost differentiation markers and decreased their pro-inflammatory profile
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Gabriel Otero, Carmen Bolatto, Eugenia Isasi, Sofía Cerri, Paola Rodríguez, Daniela Boragno, Marta Marco, Cristina Parada, Matías Stancov, María Noel Cuitinho, Silvia Olivera-Bravo
